duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive programs that minimize operational expense while maximizing revenue generation.
Manage worldwide operations and collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders.
Lead program readiness reviews and drive closure on design/technical and operations issues.
Influence product manufacturability, testability, and supply chain responsiveness.
Monitor global industry trends and actively partner with the Design teams to identify/mitigate supply and demand challenges.
Communicate key supply, cost, and/or quality issues with management teams and develop corrective action plans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Supply Chain, Operations Management, Engineering, or Chemistry (Master’s degree a plus)
